imdb.plot outline: Day by day, Mexicans follow the performance that the Mexican Army and Air Force make in key areas such as reforestation, rescue in case of natural disasters, or the battle against organized crime. Tasks very different in appearance but united by the same purpose: the protection of the Mexican society and the safeguarding of its institutions.
imdb.title: Historia del Ejército y la Fuerza Aérea Mexicanos, 2da parte
akas: Historia del Ejército y la Fuerza Aérea Mexicanos, 2da parte (Mexico)
plot: Day by day, Mexicans follow the performance that the Mexican Army and Air Force make in key areas such as reforestation, rescue in case of natural disasters, or the battle against organized crime. Tasks very different in appearance but united by the same purpose: the protection of the Mexican society and the safeguarding of its institutions.::Clío TV
